Medication:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#MedicationFHIR R5 Resource `Medication` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Medication`. Element `Medication` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication`.

Medication.code (code):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#Medication.codeElement `Medication.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.code`.
Medication.status (status):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#Medication.statusElement `Medication.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.status`.

Medication.doseForm (doseForm):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#Medication.formElement `Medication.doseForm` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.form`.
Medication.totalVolume (totalVolume):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#Medication.amountElement `Medication.totalVolume` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.amount`.
Medication.ingredient (ingredient):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#Medication.ingredientElement `Medication.ingredient` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.ingredient`.
Medication.ingredient.item (item):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#Medication.ingredient.item[x]Note that the target element context `Medication.ingredient.item[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Medication.ingredient`. Element `Medication.ingredient.item` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.ingredient.item[x]`. Note that the target element context `Medication.ingredient.item[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Medication.ingredient`.
Medication.ingredient.isActive (isActive):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#Medication.ingredient.isActiveElement `Medication.ingredient.isActive` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.ingredient.isActive`.
Medication.ingredient.strength[x] (strength[x]):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#Medication.ingredient.strengthElement `Medication.ingredient.strength[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.ingredient.strength`.
Medication.batch (batch):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#Medication.batchElement `Medication.batch` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.batch`.
Medication.batch.lotNumber (lotNumber):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#Medication.batch.lotNumberElement `Medication.batch.lotNumber` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.batch.lotNumber`.
Medication.batch.expirationDate (expirationDate):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#Medication.batch.expirationDateElement `Medication.batch.expirationDate` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.batch.expirationDate`.
Medication.definition (definition):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication#MedicationNote that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Medication.definition` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Medication.definition` is will have a context of Medication based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Medication`.

name: ConceptMapR5MedicationElementsForR4Medication
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `Medication` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Medication`.
Element `Medication` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication`.
Element `Medication.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.meta`.
Element `Medication.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.implicitRules`.
Element `Medication.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.language`.
Element `Medication.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.text`.
Element `Medication.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.contained`.
Element `Medication.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.identifier`.
Element `Medication.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.code`.
Element `Medication.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.status`.
Element `Medication.marketingAuthorizationHolder` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.manufacturer`.
Element `Medication.doseForm` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.form`.
Element `Medication.totalVolume` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.amount`.
Element `Medication.ingredient` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.ingredient`.

Note that the target element context `Medication.ingredient.item[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Medication.ingredient`.
Element `Medication.ingredient.item` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.ingredient.item[x]`.
Note that the target element context `Medication.ingredient.item[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Medication.ingredient`.
Element `Medication.ingredient.isActive` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.ingredient.isActive`.
Element `Medication.ingredient.strength[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.ingredient.strength`.
Element `Medication.batch` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.batch`.
Element `Medication.batch.lotNumber` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.batch.lotNumber`.
Element `Medication.batch.expirationDate` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Medication.batch.expirationDate`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Medication.definition` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`.
Element `Medication.definition` is will have a context of Medication based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Medication`.
